entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Aklavik
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:43 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -39.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Aklavik Airport 11:14 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -39.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.8 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 66 %
Wind Chill: -45
Dewpoint: -43.5°C
Wind: NNE 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 35. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear near noon then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 35. Wind chill near minus 48. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 44.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 44. Wind chill minus 48 this evening and minus 55 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022
